review: if you only want youtube and pandora controlled from your phone or device, this is for you. I wanted to stream plex and found that you need to have a paid app or subscription to stream. there is also no remote, so if you want to control from different devices, you need to buy the app on each device (i.e. tablet, iphone, android).I have a Roku3, and i much prefer to go ahead and get another one for other rooms and have a remote and free apps.
author: Christopher Weger

review: If you don't already have a Roku, them this would probably be 5 stars for you.  None evasive with extra wires all around & the fact that you can control it with any Wi-Fi device in your home.  We already have a Roku which pretty much does the same.  I thought we would of been able to stream from websites to the TV, but not so. Was looking forward to cutting cable so I could stream shows from the bravo website through this device, but you can only go through certain channels of "Chromecast". For the price though it is definantly worth it! We spent $99 on the Roku. Did not give 5 stars because you cannot stream from direct website
